Posts.Content: retirednana wrote: this is the third year i have chosen to have a 3D annual screening. I have been scheduled an ultrasound for “possible mass Inferior left breast 6cm from nipple". I am quite worried since I was told the 3D was quite accurate. I am 62 with very small breasts,heterogenously dense. I cannot feel a lump. How often are false positives from the 3D mammogram and how can a mass be 6 cm in a very small Breast? Also, what does “inferior” mean on this test I still have 8 days until my ultrasound. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Recall after 3D mammogram retirednana retirednana

Posts.Content: Apr 10, 2018 08:15AM retirednana wrote: thank you for explaining. I’ve had a callback before with digital mammography but have a concern with this 3D callback.
